1.20.2.5.1.1.0-beta: Added option to disable enchantment combining recipes
1.20.2.5.1.0.1-beta: [Fabric] Fixed recipes disabling not working until datapack reload
1.20.2.5.1.0.0-beta: Fixed repair recipes disabling not working correctly
1.20.2.5.0.0.0-beta: Release for Minecraft 1.20.2. Compatible with NeoForged

1.20.1.4.1.4.0: Improved disabling of repair recipes. Fixed JEI recipe click area not working correctly
1.20.1.4.1.3.0: Added option to disable repair and enchantment recipes
1.20.1.4.1.2.0: Added ability to set NBT Tags for inputs. Improved JEI Integration
1.20.1.4.1.1.0: Added REI Integration. Improved JEI Integration. Using ParchmentMC mappings. Compatible with NeoForged
1.20.1.4.1.0.0: Added JEI and CraftTweaker Integration. Added tooltip info whether item is consumed in recipe. Changed args order in CraftTweaker scripts to make it more intuitive
1.20.1.4.0.0.0: Added Fabric support. Refactor into a multi-project

1.19.2.1.3.0.0: Fixed a lot of bugs & redesigned recipe script
